errors.UNAUTHORIZED: You are not authorized to view this page.
errors.FORBIDDEN: You do not have permission to view this page.
errors.SOCIAL_ACCOUNT_ALREADY_LINKED: This social account is already linked to another user.
errors.USER_EMAIL_NOT_FOUND: No account found with this email address.
errors.EMAIL_NOT_VERIFIED: Please verify your email address before signing in.
errors.USER_ALREADY_EXISTS: An account with this email already exists.
errors.SESSION_EXPIRED: Your session has expired. Please sign in again.
errors.FAILED_TO_UNLINK_LAST_ACCOUNT: Cannot unlink the last authentication method.
errors.USER_ALREADY_HAS_PASSWORD: User already has a password set.
errors.HOUSEHOLD_INVITATION_ALREADY_EXISTS: An invitation for this user to this household already exists.
errors.HOUSEHOLD_USER_ALREADY_EXISTS: This user is already part of this household.
errors.ADMIN_HOUSEHOLD_USER_CANNOT_LEAVE: Admin users cannot leave the household. Please transfer admin rights to another user before leaving.

consumptionPerTimeChart.title: Filter the consumption by {granularity}.
consumptionPerTimeChart.description: Select one of the bars to view consumption.

consumptionPerCategoryChart.title: Filter consumption by category.
consumptionPerCategoryChart.description: Select one of the sections to view consumption.

consumptionPerEventChart.noEventsFound: Here you will find the events ordered by highest to lowest consumption. In case the category selected has one or more Tags, the events will be classified into Tags.

deleteHousehold.confirmDescriptionBold: This will delete the household "{householdName}" and all of its associated data.
deleteHousehold.confirmDescriptionText: This action cannot be undone. Please be certain.

step2.title: Address information (optional).
step2.description: Enter the household address information. This information is optional, but it will help you to identify your household.

sensorId.label: Sensor ID
sensorId.description: Enter the 12-character ID from the back of your sensor. Just type the letters and numbers; the colons (:) will be added for you automatically.

createInvitation.title: Invite a user
createInvitation.description: Enter the email address of the user you want to invite to your household.
createInvitation.success: Invitation sent successfully! Please notify the user to check their email.

leaveHousehold.title: Do you want to leave the household?
leaveHousehold.description: If you leave the household, you will no longer be able to see the consumption data.
leaveHousehold.success: You have successfully left the household.

leaks.title: Leaks
leaks.description: {count, plural, =0 {You have no leaks} =1 {You have 1 leak} other {You have # leaks}}

categorize.title: Categorize
categorize.description: {count, plural, =0 {You have no events to categorize} =1 {Categorize 1 event} other {Categorize # events}}

newEventSheet.title: New event
newEventSheet.noTagsForCategory: No tags found for this category
newEventSheet.notesPlaceholder: Add an optional note for this event
newEventSheet.eitherStartOrEndRequired: Either start time or end time is required, or both
newEventSheet.endCannotBeBeforeStart: End time cannot be before start time

editEventSheet.title: Edit event
editEventSheet.notesPlaceholder: Add an optional note for this event
editEventSheet.noTagsForCategory: No tags found for this category.

editTagsDialog.title: Edit tags
editTagsDialog.noTagsForCategory: No tags found for this category
editTagsDialog.noTagsForSink: You can create a tag for the different sinks, for example for the kitchen sink, the bathroom sink, etc.
editTagsDialog.noTagsForShower: You can create a tag for the different showers, for example for your child's shower, your shower, etc.
editTagsDialog.noTagsForWasher: You can create a tag for the different programs of the washing machine, for example for the eco, sport, etc.
editTagsDialog.noTagsForDishwasher: You can create a tag for the different programs of the dishwasher, for example for the eco, normal, etc.
editTagsDialog.deleteTagDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this tag? This action cannot be undone and it will remove the tag from all events that have it.

onboarding.title: Start by creating your first household
onboarding.subtitle: Track your water usage and discover where you can save the most. Let’s get started by setting up your home.

notFound.title: Page not found.
notFound.description: The page you are looking for does not exist.

signin.title: Welcome
signin.description: Enter your email and password to access your account

signup.title: Create your account
signup.description: Enter your information to create a new account
signup.name: Name
signup.successMessage: Account created successfully! Please check your email to verify your account.

forgotPassword.title: Forgot Password
forgotPassword.description: Enter your email to receive a link to reset your password.
forgotPassword.successMessage: Reset password link has been sent to your email

resetPassword.title: Reset Password
resetPassword.successMessage: Your password has been reset successfully!

invalidToken.title: Invalid or expired reset token.
invalidToken.description: Please request a new password reset.

validation.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
validation.passwordMin: Password must be at least 8 characters

joinHousehold.invalidTokenMessage: Please provide a valid invitation token to join a household.
joinHousehold.expiredTokenMessage: The invitation token is invalid or has expired.
joinHousehold.invitationAcceptedMessage: You have successfully joined the household.
joinHousehold.invitationDeclinedMessage: You have successfully declined to join the household.
joinHousehold.joinHouseholdMessage: You have been invited to join a household. Do you want to accept this invitation?

efficiency.title: Efficiency
efficiency.optimalConsumption: Your consumption is optimal. Keep it up!
efficiency.optimalConsumptionCategory: Your {category} consumption is optimal. Keep it up!

verification.title: Verify your email address
verification.thankYou: Thank you for registering with MICA. We're delighted to have you with us!
verification.instruction: To complete your registration and verify your email address, please click the button below:
verification.important: Important: If you didn't request this email, please ignore this message.
verification.fallback: If the button doesn't work, you can click on this link:
verification.expiryNote: This link will expire in {days} days.
verification.help: If you have any questions or need help, don't hesitate to contact us.
verification.automaticNote: This is an automated email. Please do not reply to this message.

resetPassword.title: Reset your password
resetPassword.instruction: Someone has requested a password reset for your account. If this was you, please click the button below to continue.
resetPassword.buttonInstruction: Click the button below to reset your password:
resetPassword.important: Important: If you didn't request this email, please ignore this message.
resetPassword.fallback: If the button above does not work, please copy and paste the following URL into your web browser:
resetPassword.automaticNote: This is an automated email, please do not reply.

householdInvitation.title: Household invitation
householdInvitation.invitation: You have been invited by {inviterName} to join the "{householdName}" household.
householdInvitation.instruction: To accept the invitation and join the household, please click the button below:
householdInvitation.important: Important: If you didn't request this email, please ignore this message.
householdInvitation.fallback: If you're having trouble with the button, please copy and paste the following URL into your web browser:
householdInvitation.automaticNote: This is an automated message. Please do not reply to this email.
